content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
The first night was 03/28/14 and i was outside on the porch after letting the dog outside and i saw a starlike but a orb of light that was literally going up down to the right a little then stopping and then started moving to the left again it was unbelievable to watch it in realtime. so after letting the dog inside i stayed outside to watch it for a total hour until my neck started to cramp and i went inside. 

the next night 03/29/14  i'm watching tv and its next to a window. and during commercials i would just randomly take a peak out just maybe i'm thinking i can find it again but this time its two of them and they are both making those same movements from the night before. i watched them just dance over my house in the sky. but by this time i'm just telling myself this is as close as i wanna get. and i'm starting to try to send that vibe out there with my mind. and just like that there gone. 

next night 03/30/14 i find the same thing around 10pm but this time there closer and i can see its not giving off a light but more of just a solid shpere and it stops and i'm thinking to myself i wonder if it will go right if i think to say it in my head and sure enough it makes a right and stops again i wait to see if it would move on its own and it didnt so then i said go left and thennthis object did just that. i was really kind of scaring myself alittle so i decided after probably another hour or so watching it move all directions that i should try to tell it just to leave me alone and and fly away. i look away for maybe 7 min or so and its gone like that.

so tonight 03/31/14 i got home late around midnight and open my curtains to find a huge group of lights out the same window but this is when i decided its really time to share. because they all moved, mirroring eachother...But then with my hand.  i feel like its a show they put it on for me. with my room lights off and tv on. but i don't know what to do or how to stop thinking about it in a weird way. but the next 30 min passed and they were gone like that, out of my view. 

thanks
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: So i finally decided  to report everything after tonight. thats bc the last four nights ive been seeing these intelligent  ufos flying above or around my house.

content.detailedDescription:
New years eve. i was setting my nikon d90 at a condo in the 7th floor of a building right by the sea at puerto vallarta, to catch some good pictures of fireworks.

while getting my settings adjusted i notice that with every shot, i was getting some weird lights on my display screen, although nothing was visible at eye sight. as a photographer i knew it could be a number of different things, from dirt on the sensor, to reflecting lights through the lens, to a low shutter speed causing distortion of the light. i will explain in the following points the technical characteristics of the images i��ve attached to discard the possible explanations mention above.

- as shown in the series of pictures, the shot was taken from the same place at the same angle in a period of 1 hour 39 minutes. during that period the boats at the bay, the people and the chinese balloons show movement caused my a shutter speed of 5 sec at f7.1...Meaning the shutter speed was open during 5 seconds, and during that time anything moving would register blurred in movement.. but not the 2 pairs of lights in the sky... meaning the lights were not moving at all during those 5 seconds. that fact alone discards the possibility of airplane, helicopter, random lights int the sky or anything moving.

- in the second photo, all the boats have moved but the 2 pairs of lights are in the exact same place 32 min after the first picture was taken, (this could mean dirt in the sensor or the lens, maybe light in the back of the camera filtering through the lens right?)

- third picture.. 14 min after the last picture... both sets of lights have drastically change their position, but maintaining formation. this discards what was mention above. i believe this are 2 different objects hovering above the bay. 

- fourth picture ... after new years fireworks, both sets of light change their position in the sky once again, yet like int he last picture they maintain their formation, also a fifth light appears. 

the lights were only visible through the camera and only with very low shutter speeds. after the fireworks i took more pictures and the lights were gone.

my guess is as good as yours, i would love your input on the subject.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights over the bay in puerto vallarta at new years eve (series of photos taken by professional photographer)

content.detailedDescription:
Jan 91 working as a quality assurance person at the radford army ammo plant in radford ,my job was to collect samples and check quality of product being made .
just weeks befor there ad been a large layoff and the roll powder area i was checking only had 5 people working in the whole area ,of 20/30 buildings
 it was three in the  morning and i ad just made a quality check on the only building working in the area ,it was a way back to the office so i decided to walk. we were having a full moon so bright  i was able to doo paperwork outside by moon light .
i stoped under a telephone pole to finish my paper work , and noticed a shodow starting over me ,a strange tingle in my body and i looked up and there was a large trangle moving over me whch i watched travel over the mt. and it took 15 min or so 
this was moving so slow i couldn't take my eyes off of it   it looked black wth three domes ,one on each corner (non lit. at the back there was light shining around a crack around the back edge with 4 unlit cyrcles .
at the same time i could see stars through t (like haze on a hot road)but it was solid
making no noise and moving so slow it should not flown .
this is a restricted air space over an ammunition plant ,i keept waiting on jets that watch the area ,but none came
because of ny job i was afraid to report this (my days of sampling rocket proplemt and nitro glissern would of been over im sure)
iv kept this story to myself till now but ever fer years i dream about it ove
content.summary: Flew overead and sadow was seen o ground by moonligt

content.detailedDescription: Out walking the dogs and looked to see flying silent above the scattered clouds with 3 bright light and 3 smaller light none flashing and all the same color called for my sister to witness and saw the same thing
content.summary: Flying triangle

content.detailedDescription: While my girlfriend and i were to traveling down i-95 in virginia, i noticed 3 orange-red floating lights in the horizon heading south. one light was on the right side of the highway and the other 2 were on the left side of the highway. the lights were level but the third light was a little further left and down of the other light on the same side. i was not driving so my attention was fully on the lights. air traffic is high in northern va so people are accustomed to various flying objects. but these were not anything i could recognize. the characteristics of the lights were not normal, meaning they were not flashing or blinking methodically and they were larger than any star in the night sky. as i continue staring at the lights i notify my girlfriend to take a look. she thinks nothing of them except after a few seconds of looking we both see a fourth light appear out of no where on the left side where 2 of them were positioned. and it formed a rough triangle. the fourth light was of the same size and shape and color as the previous 3. at this point i was flabbergasted. my girlfriend couldn't believe it. it's been about 2 miles since i first noticed the lights, and we were getting closer. but soon the highway changed direction and trees blocked the view. after a a few minutes later the view became clear but the lights were already gone.
content.summary: 4 floating light orbs on i-95

content.detailedDescription: During the day taking sky sun clouds pictures after looking at them there were many odd  orbs .Close. in trees yard and far away in sky many days a lot of pics   and some. more  not to speak of now will in near future got pics if the shinny dust to
content.summary: Light orbs many pics nite day  some video  to and  artafac

content.detailedDescription:
This is the third sighting of this ufo that i have reported to mufon this month (march 2014). previous sighting were in the same direction (s/sw) at the same approx time of night (9-10pm). prior sighting were on march 5, and march 26, 2014. several videos and still photos were submitted from the sighting on 3/26/14. one video was taken during this sighting of 3/31/14 also.

the ufo is a very bright star like orb, that changes colors very rapidly and at random. the direction of travel is also at random and in short bursts. due to the distance from my observation point, i would estimate that the speed and distance of travel is extremely fast. it is also apparent that no known aircraft has the ability to change direction like this. 

the video was approx.3-4 minutes in duration and is being uploaded with this report to mufon for further investigation and enhancement. the object continued this pattern of colors and movement while i returned to my home to complete this report. i am very confident that the ufo will make a repeat appearance.
content.summary: Bright pulsating orb displaying rapid changing colors, moving irradically

content.detailedDescription:
Clear night camping at carpinteria state park on the california coast about 9:30 pm my husband and i spotted a orange ball in the sky coming towards us from the south at a low altitude. as it got closer it looked like an orange fireball triangle with white lights in each corner. we watched it turn towards the northwest and go higher in the sky then disappear. when it changed directions the white lights were no longer seen just the bight orange fireball. it became really small before disappearing. 
i thought it could be a meteorite but seconds after it disappeared a second one came from the south and was exactly the same as the first and followed exactly the same path as the first one. 
we were amazed at what we saw and find it really interesting. i have never thought to look up on the internet about ufo and was surprised to find so many sightings. i was hoping to get information by a new station but nothing came up. i kick myself for not grabbing the ipad and record them.
content.summary: Clear night very bright triangle with bright white lights in each corner came from south low toward us. turned nw flying really high disappeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to smoke a cigarette was looking at the sky as i always do .I just so happened to be looking in that general direction at a star and out of nowhere really dimly lite triangles came flying across the sky. the first one looked like it may have been 2 of them together very close because it was 6 dimly lite lights and shortly after was another one that was only 3 dimly lite lights . they were moving rather fast with no sound and were not that far away from my view . i don't live far from bwi airport and they were lower than the planes that take off from there.You could see through the middle of them as if they were cloaked but the lights seemed like they were fixed a corners of a triangle . i have seem many things while lying in the pool during the summers of past years but never seen anything like this before . that was insane . the lights were so dim that if you wasn't looking in that general direction when they flew over you probably wouldn't have noticed , they were moving rather fast ...Wow i am still in awe.
content.summary: 3 sets of 3 triangulated small craft dimly lite at the corners

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i live near orlando airport we see planes all of the time.
tonight we witnessed a object in the sky right over our house with about 8 low emitting lights heading northwest. the object made absolutely no sound. my wife even looked at me and said did you see that it didn't make a sound.I was excited i always look up you never know what your going to see i'm just glad my wife was there as well.
content.summary: My wife and i looked up there was a object moving with 8 low emmitting lights on it very low with no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on i-80 east in wyoming on my way home to ohio it was about 1400 hours when i saw two possibly three shinny diamond shape objects zip by  as i was taking a pic with my iphone.  i threw my phone in the passenger seat to put my window down to look to see if i could still see them but they were gone.

i felt excited that i might of actually gotten something i looked at the pic i took and it looks like you can see movement trails. 

my car is a 2013 mustang gt there is no chromium around the windshield or on top of my dashboard. 

my flash was off. 

i just submitted the same report but before i could finish the second part after submitting the first part i inadvertently closed the report before i could finish the second part. i'm resubmitting to make sure you got the report since i did not get to complete the second part on the first report.
content.summary: Two diamond shaped objects zipped past my windshield as i was taking a pic driving on i-80 east in wyoming.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a jetblue flight to w.Palm bch, almost there. pilot said we were going to start descending, so i looked out the window to see and directly accross it was just there, i looked at it and said to my husband did you see that, and when i looked away and back it was gone. i was elated.
content.summary: I was on airplane and i saw it just hangin there with the clouds, oval silver metallic ball

content.detailedDescription: I am a crane operator in nj. my partner and i just started up the 250 ton american crane, and we were talking by the cab standing on the cat walk.  i notice a light moving straight up the hudson river going north.  i said to my partner look at that plane it's moving really fast!  we both looked in amazement as the object got closer at incredible speed.  it was huge, and it was loosing parts or something, it was definitely burning.  as it passed over the world trade center it left a puffy cloud, from our point of view it was directly over the towers.  as it passed us, i remebered that i had a camera.  it was a low resolution digital camera.  after i snapped the picture, the object split perfectly into three parts. one went straight, and one went to the right and the other went to the left in perfect synchronization as all three descended.  my son was working a few blocks away and he and some others saw it as well, but not  the split. where we were we had the advantage because we were right by the river.  later that day there was a report on the radio that this object was seen as for as south carolina, and they said it was an old russian space ship.  to this day i don't believe that story.  it was never mention again on any news, television or newspaper. it was big! and you can hear it roaring as it went by.  on the left of the photo is the edge of the boom of the crane, it had to be about 75 miles or more passed us when i took this picture. again it was big!
content.summary: Fire ball split into three directions.

content.detailedDescription:
On my trip back home in august 17 2013 as i was driving on i- 80 east i saw two diamond shape object zip by at the top of my left windshield  just as i was taking a pic with my iphone. i threw my phone in the passenger seat put my window down and they were gone. in the pic it looks like each left a movement trail. i think there was a third one but the top of my windshield blocked the view put looks like you can see a third movement trail. 

my car i'd a 2013 mustang gt i don't believe it was a reflection as it would of been about 1430 or so. 

i felt excited when i saw them in awe.

the shape each object looks like two diamonds together top and bottom. 

by the time i snapped the pic and put my iphone down they were gone.
content.summary: Two -three diamond  shaped objects zipped past my windshield as i was taking a pic on i-80 in wyoming.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 65 yr old widow. my 16 year old granddaughter and i just pulled into my driveway returning from wal mart.
we saw 2 bright orange lights in the distance to the east of our house.
my granddaughter took the groceries into the house and ran back outside.
we just stood there watching 2 objects-that looked spaceships flying all over the place.
they stayed together-and changed direction at least 5 times.
just floating.
we were a little scared but they were fascinating to watch.
there was no sound at all to them.
i have no idea as to what they were or where they came from.
after 15 min or so--poof they were both gone!
we know what we saw--but not what they were.
now we do believe in ufo's for sure.
mary huhn
813 385 0194
content.summary: Scared but interesting

content.detailedDescription:
On march 14, 2014, i was flying a piper archer from st. petersburg, fl to melbourne, fl. i decided to take a picture out of the front of the plane just for kicks because i wanted to have one for my collection. i nor my passenger, noticed the object at that time because i was trying to take the picture and keep the plane level.
i did not notice the object until march 26, 2014 when i decided to load it on my computer. it could be a scratch or a photo anomaly for all i know but when i zoomed in on the object it appears to be moving from the left of my view to the right and it appears to be climbing.
there is an object in the distance that looks like a star and an object that looks like a gray/black disk/cigar in the center of the picture.
content.summary: I was flying a piper archer from st. pete to melbourne and discovered the craft in the picture taken.

content.detailedDescription:
I live about 50 miles ese of stephenville. some nights it is a zoo in the sky. i've seen solid whites, solid red lights maneuvering,something with white strobes, a rectangular object. not a one made a sound, not a one had regular aviation night strobes.Four have come right over my house, low and no propeller, jet, propulsion noise at all. 
 something is going on around here sometimes.
content.summary: Mostly strange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my phone with a friend, i looked up because i heard a humming noise and witnessed a large triangle shaped craft with dim triangle shaped lights on the bottom, it had a red pulsating light in the middle of the craft and white lights on each tip of the triangle. it was roughly 500 to 800 ft above when it passed over me and was heading in a very slow but straight path northwest from my position. i watched the craft until it disappeared after roughly 5 minutes behind trees. i didn't really know what to think but i yelled for my girlfriend and she witnessed it's very slow movement as well.
content.summary: Outside on phone,  heard hum noise, looked up and saw large slow triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: Someone needs to come find out what this is.  it is out there every morning.  i forgot to put that it is out there everyday in the report i filed the other day.  please come see it like i said it is out there everyday it's prerrt stationary but moves a little or sometimes a lot.  i attached a photo the other day.
content.summary: This thing is out there every morning i see it all lit up every day a sphere all lit up.

content.detailedDescription: We were having dinner with our friend regius, and suddenly a strange entity appeared at the table. it was blinking, and extending something like an arm toward a sandwich. our friend peter was very upset, because it was his sandwich, and tried to struggle with the entity. however, regio thowed an empty bottle of red wine, and the entity seemed to swallow it. then, the entity ran toward the toilet, and came back in less than a second, with a threatening attitude, screaming in an unknown language. we got very scared, and run very fast to the door, but in a few seconds the sound dissapeared, and when we turned out to look up, the entity was no longer there. at the end, a strange smell invaded all the house. we detected what seemed a kind of red jelly on the floor, and regio tried to call the authorities, but the police did't show up (which is normal in our country). the next week, regio tried to clean up the stain, but it was impossible, and the stain still remains there. the house is for rent, because regio is very scared.
content.summary: The entity was horrible. it tried to catch us, but we run away as fast as we could,

content.detailedDescription:
I set my video camera up outside; facing towards the western sky @ a 45 degree angle. i noticed a white flash, backed video up and slowed speed to 1/8 of full speed, and noticed a white disk-shaped object moving from the upper right, and going left; with a slight downward dip, then going back upward after it enters the clouds at about center. i knew immediately that this could not be ours; as this object was not noticeable @ full speed...And considering the distance must have been at least 1/2 mile; and traveled that distance in .33 seconds. 

i also captured additional anomalies as well, during further review...40-50 in total...Mostly white; with some being saucer like, and others a streak of white, and even orb shaped; moving in various directions.

most of the anomalies i noticed; were either solid white, or a very light grey.
content.summary: On 3/23/14, i video taped western sky @ a 45 degree angle for 29 minutes. when slowed to .124 speed, i caught disk object coming from upper right, moving left(south). object dipped downward, then back up after going through clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the sofa, and i saw a green light in the sky, by the window

i live in metz, in queuleu, not so far from the 'centre pompidou'

it was dark night

first i thought it was a firework, but it wasn't

i observate the light going straight, and quite quickly in direction of east

it was not a plane (no blinking), neither an helicopter or a military plane (absolutely no noise)

there is usually no planes flying where i live and no military exercises, no fireworks apart during fests

i posted a signal in facebook to ask if someone else saw it. a friend told me that her neighbour posted a similar signal some minutes after mine. this person live in remelfing, at the east of where i live. 

i decided to go outside on a higher spot in order to scan the sky, but no more light... it was very quick.

i had a look at tweeter, someone saw something similar near zurich, something like 10 minutes before i saw it...

that was strange, i was not afrais, i'm usually "ovniphobic", but this light made me curious.


thank you ! hope my witness will be helpful :)
content.summary: Green light hovering above the hill where i live

content.detailedDescription:
During the summer of 1969, when i was eighteen years old, i visited block island. after the ferry boat from new london, conn., arrived in new shoreham, i headed out alone to black rock point a little past the mohegan bluffs on the island���s south coast. there, i found an abandoned, weather-beaten, wooden lean-to shaped like a boy scout���s tent sunken into one of the bluffs, about halfway up the slope, or just a little more. i���ve always called it a ���lean-to,��� but strictly speaking, it was a bit different in that the two narrower sides were open and the roof came to a peak in the middle. it was nine or ten feet long and maybe five feet high at the peak. 
	after awhile the tide came in, and along with the darkness, a thick fog. that night i heard all sorts of strange sounds, which i attributed to fatigue, nerves, and the noise of the sea and wind. at first i thought i heard voices on the shore below  but there was no sign of any visitor. ���my ears are playing tricks on me,��� i thought. after awhile, it seemed as if several people were speaking a few feet away, near the farther end of the lean-to. yet their words were not quite recognizable; it was as if they were speaking in an adjacent dimension. this too i chalked up to nerves.
	then there was a loud crash against the front wall of the lean-to, the side that faced the sea, as if it had been struck by a rock. this was no figment of my imagination. 
	in terror, i ran outside, and called out. but there was no reply. i tried to examine the wall of the lean-to, but could hardly see a thing in the dark. the wind was blowing and the tides were making a lot of noise at the shore below. i quickly scrambled up the steep clay incline, using both my hands and feet. the fog was so thick that i was nearly blind, but dared not stop. 
	as i got over the crest, i sensed a presence over my head, but i didn���t look up; just kept running into the miasma across the bed of rubbery green stuff that grew profusely atop the bluffs. a moment later i found myself encircled in a wide ring of light, despite the fog. it was as if a huge floodlight had been focused on me from above as i ran, although this seemed to be physically impossible, given the fog. then on the upper periphery of my vision, i saw what i first imagined was a giant bird about the size of a small plane silently gliding over my head, seeming to shut off the light as it flew by. (in the mufon checklist, i called this a boomarang shape, but it���s really hard to be sure. the sizes and distances are also very rough guesses. and i never saw it in proximity to the horizon, just when it was above me.) i kept running.
	eventually i reached the paved road and hitched a ride back to town with two guys around nineteen or twenty years old who lived on the island with their families. on the way, they asked me what i had been doing near black rock point at night. when i told them what had just occurred, they were astonished. ���didn���t you notice that all of the houses out there are empty? everyone knows���that���s the most haunted part of the island! nobody goes out there after dark!���
	because of this, for decades i believed that the entire episode was some sort of poltergeist phenomenon. but now i���m inclined to believe that it was a ufo experience ��� my first and i hope, my last.
content.summary: Poltergeist phenomena followed by silent craft with beam gliding over my head as i ran across bluffs near block island sea shore.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to pick my son up from sea cadets when i saw an orange light in the sky. i thought nothing of it and continued in the direction of the light. i then noticed erratic movement of the light but put it down to my driving as i was doing 30mph. the light went out of sight as i was driving disappearing behing rooftops. i turned left onto scrapsgate road and knew the light would be directly to my left and i looked while still driving. it had changed direction and was heading my way....Again i thought nothing of it as i was in a heavily built up residential area. while driving at 20mph i was still watching the orange light and saw it rise up and vanish. i looked back onto the road for 3/4 seconds and looked once more outta curisoty again. i saw something and pulled over immediatly. there was a hazy metallic disc (not shiny) hovering  now closeby. my window was already down and i leaned right out to take a better look. this disc object had no lights and no sound and was moving back and forth above my vehicle..... i wanted to get out but my commitment to my son was graeter so i sped off. the disk followed me for 2 seconds and i loast visual of it...... when i say it was hazy it was like it was kind of cloaked into then night sky but not fully. it wasn't translucent and the way it moved was unconventianal and i would say not even drones or model aircraft could replicate this.... 1 more thing.... when i arrived at my destination 4/5mins later i immediatly got out the car scouting the night sky but had no look. hope this report helps
content.summary: Fireball turning into cloaked disc

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 10:10pm on 3/28/14 i stepped out on my upper deck because i noticed a bright orange light in the distance, which was something i had never seen before. i watched the bright orange circular light about the size of a penny just above the horizon in the sse about 2 miles away and it was growing bigger and coming in my direction. it passed within a mile of where i was, it remained a bright orange light growing somewhat brighter and bigger when it passed within a mile of where i was. it was traveling in a straight line and moving fairly fast, probably a couple of hundred miles an hour or more. i was not able to hear any sounds or see any shape or object, just the bright orange circular light. i was able to view it for approximately 7 to 10 seconds. after it disappeared over my roof, 2 additional orange lights appeared from the same general location as the first and traveling on the same line and direction as the first. before they had gone by, another 3 bright orange lights appeared from approximately the same location as the others and were traveling on the same line, direction and speed as the previous ones. then another 2 bright orange lights appeared and went by traveling on the same path as the others. before they had disappeared one more appeared following the same path as the others as well. i waited for another 10 or 15 minutes but did not see anymore. the night was clear to the west and north for i could see airliners about 6 miles away across the bay lining up for their approach to bwi airport. but to the south it was somewhat clouded and lots of trees, so i had a shorter distance to the horizon to view.
content.summary: Bright orange lights traveling from ssw to nne in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out the front door of a friends home with my wife when she said wow what is that. the three of us spent about 3-5 minutes trying to decide what it was, as neither of us have ever seen anything like it before. then it rapidly flew away from us in the same direction it had been moving(rather slowly when we noticed it)so fast it almost seemed to just disappear.
content.summary: I was with 2 others and observered what looked kinda like plastic wrap(a huge piece) flying in a straight line for awhile then disapeared, its surface was kinda shiffting and had pulsating lights.

content.detailedDescription: I seen something a couple months ago while going down i610 in houston, tx.  i don't know if it was a drone but the wings were something i haven't seen before. they weren't straight they were like a "m" stretched out. that's the only way i can describe it with a color i've never seen before. it was lavender, baby blue, and pink mixed together. has anyone seen this?
content.summary: driving down 1 610s, was exiting on i 10e. i see helicopters and planes all the time. i don't know what this was.

content.detailedDescription: Call my cell phone i have more pictures
content.summary: Six orange lights and one white

content.detailedDescription: Driving southbound on i-25 just south of the wyoming/colorado border, i observed an unusually large, bright star-like light in the sky. i noticed the bluish-white ball of light because it was rising vertically from behind the the mountains southwest of f.E. warren air force base. it slowly rose vertically and my first thought was, "large stars do not move and they do not travel vertically". that's when i decided to stop on the shoulder and watch what this ball of light was doing. i slowed down and stopped. as i got out of the car, the ball of light stopped and then hovered for about minute. i thought, "now wait a minute! this is truly unusual". then, the ball of light took off at a 45 degree angle headed north. the speed at which it took off from a dead stop was incredible! in two seconds, the light was gone. i said to myself, "i think i just witnessed a ufo". i never reported this sighting, fearing that the fbi might want to talk to me. i never told anyone because i thought my friends might think i was crazy. about 5 years ago, i told my best friend, asking him not to reveal my secret to anyone. he has been encouraging me to report the incident. i found out recently that there is a mufon office in ft. collins, colorado. i hesitate to go there in person, so this is my report.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bluish-white ball of light sw of f.E. warren air force base

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend noticed these at a lake one night multible orbs and tiny crafts with them for several hours!!! firey ball shaped and all sorts of colors!! feel like i can contact them with spotlight and stobe lights!!They also know when we are out driving or walking around outside!! had them follow us for several miles!! they can disappear or go invisible!!! when they are close a cloud or mist comes in close contact with sudden temp. change getting extremely cold!!! i have so much to say but cant write it all!! this has been goin on for a few months!! i have let off motar shells (fireworks) when close and results in a ton of activity and more orbs and flashing crafts!!!! this is unreal!! when planes fly by they can hide by going dark!! just about any night i can find them or they can find me!!! would like an explanation what this is!!! also aprox. jan 17 2014 i drove from san diego to indiana and had an encounter with 2 flying saucers in santa rosa new mexico i was at luvs truckstop and when pulling out saw flash of red light less than 100 yards from me above a light pole, when i looked saw the saucer with a projection of nightime sky in front of it like a camo cover to hide behind!! when i focused and realize what i was seeing another one was beside it!! they were 25-30ft wide alum color on bottom kinda tan on top with blacked out windows!! no noise!! have alot more to say if someone is interested!!Seriously!!! this is unreal feel like i cant go nowhere at night without being followed!! happens damn near everyday!!! wish someone can give me info!!! to feel at ease!!! please and thank you!! i got some what of a picture but phone dont take pics at night worth looking at!!
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown, N/A
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: See orbs orange red blue-white and also sparkles red blue green objects that hover a big radius around the orb 5-7 days a week
